preArea.text: Welcome to the screen before the apple.

continuing2.text: There is something in the distance.

bigApple.text: A gigantic shape comes into view. Its deep red dominates the dark sky. It is the biggest apple you have ever seen. Most likely the biggest apple anyone has seen.

interactions.text: Find an excuse to not care
Imagine the bee that is to blame for it
Take a proportionally very small bite

circling2.text: It's quite a big apple. This takes you a while.

circling3.text: You've done a full round, you think. Keep going?

testAbilityAPass.text: So what? You don't even like apples that much. They're like - whatever. And yeah its big, but that's about it. Neat, you guess. If someone's into that sort of thing. Time to move on.

testAbilityAFail.text: Is a man not entitled to his thoughts of the bigness of this apple? Why shouldn't you be allowed to care, really?

testAbilityAFail2.text: You enjoy the incredible size of the apple for a while. But one can only marvel at such a thing for so long before questions of its origin begin to creep in. How can something like this possibly exist? From what tree does it stem? What sort of creature pollinated its flower? Is it in fact edible?

testAbilityBPass.text: Yes! Oh Magnificent Honey Giver! Oh Beating of Impossible Wings! Oh Chitin of Black and Yellow. Oh Lord of Flowers. Oh Great Polinator! Oh!

testAbilityBPass2.text: You are no longer before the great apple. In your fervor of imagination you have entered a hyper-real space of archetypal bee-ness

noms.text: You take a small bite. It tastes like an apple! Do you like apples?

nomsYes.text: It's pretty good. Not amazing, but decent.

nomsNo.text: Predictably, you're not impressed. Why did you do that?

noms2.text: You take a step back - your bite clearly visible on the otherwise perfect skin of the apple. An eternal blemish. A primal sin.

noms3.text:
Regret grips your soul like a thousand cold, dead hands. Your vision begins to swim. You lose your balance. Darkness closes in around you. 
You Lose!

imaginaryBeeSpace.text:
The bee is magnificent. You do not want to leave. You don't need to. 
You Win!

acceptance.text: It's nice here. Will you be happy?

acceptancePass.text:
You can imagine a life here, in the sun. Perhaps you will allow yourself to be happy. 
You Win!

acceptanceFail.text: On second thought, maybe you'd rather have another look at the apple...
